name: mongoose-pii
description: A Mongoose plugin that lets you transparently cipher stored PII and use securely-hashed passwords.  Helps with security best practices for data storage.

devInfo.why-no-deprecation-in-test: Because we’re intentionally testing deprecated Mongo/Mongoose APIs are still hooked onto (count, findAndModify, update…)
